useCase.name: Add New Edge Agent
useCase.description: Assumptions: Alice has chosen existing or add new device from options in Edge Agent Start. Edge Agent 2 has been provisioned as described in the Provision New Agent diagram.
useCase.trigger: Alice initiates the process to add a new edge agent with selected authorizations.

mainSequence.step: Alice instructs Edge Agent 2 on adding and authorizing the new agent.
Alice adds the agent with selected authorizations.
Edge Agent 1 displays the provisioning code for adding Agent 2.
Alice shows the code to Edge Agent 2 for scanning.
Edge Agent 1 sends keys and authorizations for Agent 2 to store in the wallet.
Edge Agent 1 confirms the addition of Agent 2.
Agent 1 adds keys and authorizations for Agent 2 to the policy registry.
Edge Agent 1 syncs data to Agent 2.
Agent 2 stores the data in the wallet.
